params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>p</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">p</annotation></semantics></math>: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>7</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mn>3</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>21</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">7 \times 3 = 21</annotation></semantics></math>. What is the truth value of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mtext>~</mtext>
  <mi>p</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\text~p</annotation></semantics></math> ?

params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>t</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">t</annotation></semantics></math>: Broccoli is a vegetable. What is the truth value of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mtext>~</mtext>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>(</mtext>
    <mtext>~</mtext>
    <mi>t</mi>
    <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\text~{\text(\text{~}t)}</annotation></semantics></math> ?
